original_title: Jazz Icons: Papa Bue's Viking Jazzband
overview: Danish trombonist and bandleader Papa Bue leads his exemplary jazz band - known as the Viking Jazzband - in this live concert recording from the Tivoli Garden Concert Hall. Papa Bue and his band were considered important proponents of the Dixieland jazz revival.
title: Jazz Icons: Papa Bue's Viking Jazzband
